name: card
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool card_draw_simulator.
Tool description: Draw cards from a regular 52 playing cards deck with a variety of options.
API description: Draw a card from a regular 52-card playing deck using the RapidAPI card draw simulator.

suit.description: The suit of the card to draw (e.g., 'hearts', 'diamonds', 'clubs', 'spades'). Default is 'all' to allow any suit.

value.description: The value of the card to draw (e.g., 'A', '2', 'K'). Default is 'A'.
